hero.title: Sponsorships
hero.subtitle: The businesses that actively support the Monero Project in its goal to bring financial privacy to the world.

currentSponsors.title: Current Sponsors
currentSponsors.subtitle: These organizations provide ongoing support for Monero infrastructure and development.

contributions.tari-labs: Sponsors the CDN used by this website
contributions.cake-wallet: Sponsors the mailing list, GitLab, Matrix, Taiga, and Weblate
contributions.cypher-stack: Sponsors devops personnel to work on and maintain Monero Project infrastructure
contributions.macstadium: Sponsors a dedicated Mac Mini that is used for Mac-related development
contributions.symas: Sponsors its CTO Howard Chu (hyc) for his work on the Monero codebase

becomeASponsor.title: Become a Sponsor!
becomeASponsor.description: If you or your organization would like to sponsor the Monero Project, please send an email to dev@getmonero.org.

pastSponsors.title: Past Sponsors
pastSponsors.subtitle: We thank these organizations for their previous support.
